tool.name: Minfi GEO
tool.description: reading Illumina methylation array data from Gene Expression Omnibus

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE) require(GEOquery, quietly = TRUE) require(IlluminaHumanMethylation450kanno.ilmn12.hg19, quietly = TRUE)
options(warn = -1) gset <- getGEO('$input_geoid')
if(length(gset)==0) stop("Empty list retrieved from GEO.") if(length(gset)>1){ warning("More than one ExpressionSet found:\n",names(gset),"\nUsing entry ",'$input2') gset <- gset[['$no_expset']] } else gset <- gset[[1]]
platform <- annotation(gset)
gr <- getLocations(IlluminaHumanMethylation450kanno.ilmn12.hg19,orderByLocation = TRUE)
locusNames <- names(gr)
sampleNames(gset) <- gset\$title
common <- intersect(locusNames, featureNames(gset)) if(length(common)==0) stop("No rowname matches. 'rownames' need to match IlluminaHumanMethylation450k probe names.")
ind1 <- match(common,fData(gset)\$Name) ind2 <- match(common,locusNames)
preprocessing <- c(rg.norm=paste0('See GEO ','$input_geoid',' for details'))
what <-'$assoc_genomic_coordinates' if(what=="Beta"){ out <- GenomicRatioSet(gr=gr[ind2,], Beta=gset[ind1,,drop=FALSE], annotation=c(array = "IlluminaHumanMethylation450k"), preprocessMethod=preprocessing) } else {
out <- GenomicRatioSet(gr=gr[ind2,], M=mat[ind1,,drop=FALSE], annotation=c(array = "IlluminaHumanMethylation450k"), preprocessMethod=preprocessing) } save(out, file = '$output_grset')

param.name: no_expset
param.label: Number of ExpressionSets
param.help: Specify if more than one ExpressionSet is found.

param.name: assoc_genomic_coordinates
param.label: Select value with associated genomic coordinates
param.help: This class holds estimate ratio of methylation level Beta value based on intensities between methylated and unmethylated alleles together with associated genomic coordinates. To avoid heteroskedasticity values can be also transformed into the logit - M value.

tool.help: This tool downloads data from GEO and then returns a GenomicRatioSet object.
